title: Explanation: If some areas are previously developed/or are in the process of development under different provisions of the DCPR, such areas can be included in the CDS only for planning purposes
clause_text: Explanation: If some areas are previously developed/or are in the process of development under different provisions of the DCPR, such areas can be included in the CDS only for planning purposes. However, such areas shall be excluded for calculation of FSI under this Regulation and the admissible FSI shall be calculated as per the relevant provisions of the DCPRunder which such areas are developed or are being developed. However, it shall be necessary to obtain consent of owner/owners of such areas for becoming part of the CDS. Eligibility of Occupants for Rehabilitation under Cluster Development Scheme (CDS)

source_pdf.text_snippet: Explanation: If some areas are previously developed/or are in the process of development under different provisions of the DCPR, such areas can be included in the CDS only for planning purposes. Howev
